import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import logo from './logo.png'; // Adjust the path to your logo import electronicsIcon from './electronics.png'; import appliancesIcon from './appliances.png'; import mechanicsIcon from './mech.png'; function App() { const [page, setPage] = useState('home'); // Control which page is shown: 'home', 'login', 'signup', 'about', 'community' const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState(null); // Tracks the selected category const [isModalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false); // Controls modal visibility const handleNavigate = (targetPage) => { setPage(targetPage); }; const handleCategoryClick = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); setPage('category'); // Navigate to the selected category's page }; const handleModalToggle = () => { setModalOpen(!isModalOpen); }; const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form behavior setModalOpen(false); // Close the modal after form submission alert('Post submitted successfully!'); // Placeholder for actual post handling }; return (
{page === 'community' && (

Find a Community Repair Forum

handleCategoryClick('Mechanics')}>

Mechanics

handleCategoryClick('Electronics')}>

Electronics

handleCategoryClick('Home Appliances')}>

Home Appliances

)} {page === 'category' && selectedCategory && (
{/* Top-right logo with community name */}

{selectedCategory} Forum

{/* Centered "No Posts Yet" message */}

No Posts Yet

{/* Add Button */} {/* Pop-up Modal */} {isModalOpen && (

Create a Post in {selectedCategory}

)}
)} {page === 'home' && (

Welcome to SkillShare - Dearborn!

Register as a Resident or Log In Below:

)} {page === 'about' && (

About Us

Welcome to SkillShare Dearborn, a community-driven platform dedicated to fostering sustainability, skill-sharing, and environmental consciousness through collaborative repair events.

Join us to learn new skills, save money, and contribute to a more environmentally friendly Dearborn!

)} {page === 'signup' && (

Sign Up Here!

)} {page === 'login' && (

Log In

)}
); } export default App;
